snippet: The influential king of the Zulus sought to distance himself on Monday from anti-foreigner comments he made three weeks ago, which the authorities there have called the catalyst for a wave of xenophobic violence.
abstract: South African Zulu king Goodwill Zwelithini attempts to distance himself from xenophobic comments he made that authorities say spurred wave of attacks on immigrants.
lead_paragraph: The influential king of the Zulus sought to distance himself on Monday from anti-foreigner comments he made three weeks ago, which the authorities there have called the catalyst for a wave of xenophobic violence.

headline.main: Zulu King Tries to Calm Anti-Foreigner Violence in South Africa
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; South Africa: Zulu King Retreats From Comments Against Foreigners
